content:
Does anyone have access to the previous year's survey questions?
I only have access to 2020. I can't view the questions from previous years, but it does seem like they do still exist on Google forms:

  • 2016
  • 2017
  • 2018
  • 2019
If you have the results of the translations and the format did not change between years, it’s the first or second line of the document IIRC
I also don't have previous year's results either.
Perhaps @Manish Goregaokar knows where previous year's questions and answers are stored. We should probably move that data to a data store controlled by the foundation (with appropriate permissions).
@rylev the google account that owns the data for 2020 is Mozilla Archive, maybe they have the previous versions too ?
I would assume so. I just need to figure out who I can ask for transferring ownership of that data.
@tmandry ^^ This might require help from the foundation to talk with Mozilla about transferring data ownership.
@rylev it's in a shared drive folder
I would love to have gsuite for rust
@rylev granted access, but don't add other people, we tend to be careful with this folder
@Manish Goregaokar have you heard any discussions about a shared Rust GSuite or file share? If not I can put it on my list of things to discuss with foundation folks
@rylev it's something I personally want and core has talked about a little bit. Would need to kick off the conversation with a list of requirements I think
It's not something on their radar yet I think
Ok cool, then I’ll make sure to involve you and the rest of core. Probably not something I’ll get to any time in the next two weeks
@rylev so, do you have access to all the surveys now?
@Nick Cameron indeed!
Great!
@rylev how are you getting the survey text into markdown? The PDFs seem to be images or at least I can't copy and paste

@Nick Cameron I am just manually typing them. It's a shame that the PDFs did not render to text to make copy pasting easy. This also means it's probably not likely that we will be able to use a tool for converting the PDFs to plain text.
Sadness. Are the pdfs the only versions of the surveys we have?
We have the original Google Forms. I could try saving them as HTML
Unfortunately there seems to be a lot of runtime rendering happening which makes saving it as HTML difficult
I think what I'll do is make a copy of the survey so that there are no answers
Can you see this here? https://forms.gle/R9Dkv3XjyAKNbvYc9
I can
Ok cool. I'll do this for all the surveys.
I'll do 2020 next since I suspect that's the one that we'll look at the most
Here's 2020: https://forms.gle/r7WiqNC76wGPWCUt8
Here's a PR adding all the old surveys: https://github.com/rust-lang/surveys/pull/19
